sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Sensex rallies 569 pts, Nifty ends above 24K; IT stocks climb
feed.summary: Domestic equity barometers stocks notched gains for a fourth day, capping a volatile session fueled by monthly derivatives expiry. The Nifty50 index climbed above 24,000, shrugging off early weakness. IT, oil & gas, and auto stocks led the advance, reflecting optimism around specific sectors.

feed.title: Sensex, Nifty hit fresh record highs; Nifty tops 24K; Sensex jumps 569 pts
feed.summary: The key equity indices ended with strong gains on Thursday, gaining for fourth day in a row. The Nifty closed above the 24,000 level after hitting days low of 23,805.40 in early trade. IT, oil & gas and auto stocks were in demand while media, PSU bank and pharma shares declined.

feed.title: Benchmarks hit record highs, Nifty ends above 23,850; RIL climbs over 4%
feed.summary: Domestic equity benchmarks continued their upward trajectory today, marking their third consecutive day of gains. The Nifty50 crossed a significant milestone, settling above the 23,850 mark for the first time. The surge was driven by buying in banking, oil & gas, and telecom heavyweights.
